name: MyIsland
description: My island is A game where u kill to survive and live long enough to see u making a fort, in this game u can customize in a very detailed way ur character that will fight zombies and sharks and get enough loot from them for creating houses, farms, walls and u can even expand ur island so u can make a whole big city. This game is only on its beta so soon it will be added multiplayer mode so friends can visit each other islands and even donate stuff. The next month this game is gonna get published on steam too so get ur beta advantages now and enjoy My Island!!!
